title._content: ["Andorra," William Warner Harper house, Wyndmoor, Pennsylvania.  (LOC)

description._content: Johnston, Frances Benjamin,, 1864-1952,, photographer. ["Andorra," William Warner Harper house, Wyndmoor, Pennsylvania. Fountain] [1919 spring] 1 photograph : glass lantern slide, hand-colored ; 3.25 x 4 in. Notes: Site History. House Architecture: Robert Rodes McGoodwin in partnership with Samuel D. Hawley 1912. Landscape: Duhring & Howe, house garden; overall plan, James Frederick Dawson and Percival Gallagher, Olmsted Brothers, 1912-1913. Today: Land now part of the Andorra Natural Area. On slide (printed): "176 Fulton Street, New York City." (Slide manufacturer T.H. McAllister-Keller Co., Inc.) Title, date, and subject information provided by Sam Watters, 2011. Forms part of: Garden and historic house lecture series in the Frances Benjamin Johnston Collection (Library of Congress). Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.16940 Call Number: LC-J717-X110- 57-A
